name: X - PostJam
description:
This is the updated version of GMTK Jam's game X!

You can find the original submission here

https://webox.itch.io/x

- Changelog

  • Fixed a bug where you went trough walls and bounce back
  • Fixed a bug where you double tap X and the player didn't flip
  • Fixed several collision realted bugs
  • Fixed a bug in main menu where the X was shown outcentered on certain resolutions

-------

Original description:

X xx xxx xxxx xxx xxxx xxxx

xxxxx x x xxx xxx xxx  xxx xxxx xxxx xxxx xxx xxx

xxxx xxx xxx xxxx xxx

xxxx xxx!

Translation:

X  is a game built for GMTK GameJam 2019 for the theme Only one.

The game uses only one sprite with different colors and it's played with only one key.. Gues which..  Depending on the color of your character and how you press the key your character will do different actions.

The game is supposed to be self explained buuuut, just in case

- Hold X to move - Double tap X to change direction - While Green, tap X to jump - While Blue gravity is disabled for 5 seconds

Have fun!
